attributes.action: pass a law requiring all persons entering the UK as imigrants to undertake national service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As our armed forces become more and more stretched helping to maintain order all over the world and the number of service personnel are falling drastically, this would be a perfect way to relieve the strain on them and also help those wishing to enter the UK integrate better

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
